title: Little Idea for Summoner Icons and Champion Mastery
body:
How about when you reach Level 5 with a Champion, you can choose either this Champion (like it is in match History for example) or one of the spell icons of this Champion as your summoner Icon?

So lets say I am Level 5 with Warwick, I can get 
http://counterpick.de/uploads/champions/warwick_icon_thumb.png http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/8a/Eternal_Thirst.png/revision/latest?cb=20130929123447&format=webp http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/0/0a/Hungering_Strike.png/revision/latest?cb=20130929123447&format=webp http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/3c/Hunter%27s_Call.png/revision/latest?cb=20130929123448&format=webp http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/1b/Blood_Scent.png/revision/latest?cb=20130929123446&format=webp http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/f7/Infinite_Duress.png/revision/latest?cb=20130929123449&format=webp

As summoner Icons

replies.body:
suddenly, alistar becomes fotm.

http://i.imgur.com/UrUaiaSs.png http://i.imgur.com/UrUaiaSs.png http://i.imgur.com/UrUaiaSs.png http://i.imgur.com/UrUaiaSs.png
Everything looks like a penis if you're imaginative enough.
Wtf kind of porn have you watched?

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/3e/Dark_Frenzy.png/revision/latest?cb=20130929122753

oooo im a ghost look at me
Has been suggested for a long time, they should really do this

Would be cool^^ 
So many individual possibilities
I was always Curious what His Q's icon was. Anyway I would love to have {{champion:432}} 's ult icon as a summoner icon.

They should really just put all three ghouls in one icon or something
Or when he gets a VU have a swarm of ghouls on the background
R.I.P {{champion:19}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:34}} and other champions with awful skill icons
I would like Warwicks W Icon.

What about when you reach max rank on a champion, you get a random skin for them? Or even get the choice of a skin for them? With the coming crafting system, it will take a considerable amount of time to get enough material to make something permanent.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/64/Massacre.png/revision/latest?cb=20130929122629&format=webp

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/84/Relentless_Assault.png/revision/latest?cb=20130929122902&format=webp

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/0/09/Heightened_Learning.png/revision/latest?cb=20150210202535&format=webp

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/48/Chosen_of_the_Storm.png/revision/latest?cb=20130929123442&format=webp
